About noez.de
Noez.de is a prepaid based VPS, gameserver, webspace and dedicated server provider, with high-quality hardware located in premium data centers in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
We have been providing hosting services since 2012.

VPS KVM Builder - starting from 1,99€/mo
  • from 128 MB RAM
  • from 10 GB HDD
  • from 1 CPU Core
VPS KVM 1 - starting from 4,50€/mo
  • 2 GB RAM
  • 40 GB SSD
  • 1 CPU Core
VPS KVM 2 - starting from 9,50€/mo
  • 4 GB RAM
  • 80 GB SSD
  • 2 CPU Cores
VPS KVM 3 - starting from 15,00€/mo
  • 8 GB RAM
  • 160 GB SSD
  • 4 CPU Cores
VPS KVM 4 - starting from 26,50€/mo
  • 16 GB RAM
  • 160 GB SSD
  • 8 CPU Cores
Features
  • 100% Prepaid
  • Toll-free payment
  • Without notice
  • We are not a reseller
  • Many useful tools
  • Instant access to your server immediately after payment
  • Two-factor-authentication
  • DDoS protection up to 1 Tbps
  • Trained technicians
  • 24/7 monitoring
Discount
Get 10% OFF for the first month on our VPS, VPS Pro and dedicated server plans using coupon “10%neu“

Payment Methods
All servers are based on the prepaid principle. So you don‘t need to worry about endless contracts.
We accept Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Applepay, Bank Transfer, Google Wallet, Klarna, Mastercard, Maestro, Paypal, Paysafecard, Visa, Stripe, Sofortüberweisung, EPS, SEPA, Barzahlen, Giropay and iDEAL.

Information
Further information and offers are available on our website. For further questions and further information, please contact us at care@noez.de.

www.noez.de
